metadata.title: CVE-2024-3864 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bug present in Firefox 124, Firefox ESR 115.9, andThunderbird 115.9. This bug showed evidence of memory corruption and wepresume that with enough effort this could have been exploited to runarbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125 and Firefox ESR <115.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
